lead_paragraph: An LGBTQ advocacy group has sent a letter to the commissioner of the Big 12 urging the conference to remove BYU from consideration for membership because it says the school has discriminatory policies.

headline.print_headline: LGBTQ Advocacy Group Urges Big 12 to Pass on Adding BYU
headline.main: LGBTQ Advocacy Group Urges Big 12 to Pass on Adding BYU

snippet: An LGBTQ advocacy group has sent a letter to the commissioner of the Big 12 urging the conference to remove BYU from consideration for membership because it says the school has discriminatory policies....
